hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Recovery Heart#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #the souls of the Shabom#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Central Chamber Flying Pot 2

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a medium-sized fish (child)# and #a Red Rupee#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #a Green Rupee#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #the souls of the Flare Dancer#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Whispering Walls Left Pot 1

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that ##Lake Hylia## has #5# major items.

GC (Maze).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right and left hands# lie...^ #Arrows (30 pieces)# and #a Green Rupee#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that something wonderful happens when playing the Song of Storms after planting a magic bean.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Red Rupee#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Left Side Pot 1

HC (Malon).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Recovery Heart#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# is on the path to #the Tower#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Falling Spikes Lower Pot 1

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Green Rupee#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# is on the path to the #Light Medallion#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Map Chest Room Pot 2

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Red Rupee# and #a Green Rupee#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs the #Kakariko Potion Shop#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that lifting a #rock in the desert# reveals the #Royal Family's Tomb#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #a Recovery Heart#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Child Bridge Flying Pot 2

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that Morpha is easily trapped in a corner.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #a Green Rupee#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that the #Water Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that the #final treasure of Ice Cavern# is #a Red Rupee#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that a #fractured desert wall# hides the #Kokiri Shop#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Red Rupee#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #collecting cuccos# rewards #a Bottom of the Well Small Key#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that the #Flare Dancer atop the Fire Temple# guards a chest containing #a Piece of Heart#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that ##Zora's Domain## has #3# major items.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that ##the Desert Colossus## has #7# major items.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #a Recovery Heart#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Falling Spikes Lower Chest

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Green Rupee#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: Three things are certain: death, taxes, and forgetting a check.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Arrows (10 pieces)# can be found at #Lake Hylia#.
